name: Student conference advisory committee
text: There is created a student conference advisory committee to assist and advise the student conference committee in planning, coordinating and evaluating the annual conference of students.  The committee shall be composed of the chairperson of the education committee of both the house of representatives and the senate and three members of the department of education appointed by the superintendent of education. [L 1970, c 94, §4; am L 1972, c 160, pt of §1; gen ch 1993]
